document.title: Pellete de liens du 13-06-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Windows vs Linux: a modern desktop comparison We've put together a series of Windows XP, SUSE 9.3 and Ubuntu 5.04 desktop screen shots as a side-by-side comparison of some of the common desktop features available in the modern operating system desktop. (Tags: libre windows interfaces ergonomie ubuntu desktop xp suse utilisabilite )
Icon Story Animation flash rigolote. (Tags: flash animation fun icones haha )
OS X for x86 already in the wild? - Engadget - www.engadget.com Apple had OS X for Intel machines, and not a week after its announcement, a developer version? is apparently already in the wild on P2P and IRC networks. (Tags: apple p2p intel osx )
linux was my co-pilot - a photoset on Flickr They had to cycle the power on the plane as I was getting on, lo-and-behold, Song (Delta) is using Linux to run the seatback entertainment. Did I mention Microsoft paid for my flight? (Tags: linux fun flickr microsoft haha )
S5: A Simple Standards-Based Slide Show System S5 is a slide show format based entirely on XHTML, CSS, and JavaScript. With one file, you can run a complete slide show and have a printer-friendly version as well. (Tags: css conception xhtml presentation webstandards gestion-de-projet )
Dangerrrr: cats could alter your personality - Health - Times Online THEY may look like lovable pets but Britains estimated 9m domestic cats are being blamed by scientists for infecting up to half the population with a parasite that can alter peoples personalities. (Tags: medecine chats maladie )
Services_Blogmarks PHP Toolkit - BlogMarks.net : Blog We just released a PEAR Class which connect to the blogmarks.net API. (Tags: blogmarks.net php classe php.lib )
Airtight News Blog Archive De-gunk your Windows XP Here is an easy way to speed up your Windows XP machine. When you install new software, many programs will set themselves (or helper programs) to auto-start every time you reboot. (Tags: windows xp tweak )
